text: Shankaran Kuttikku Pennu Venam is a 1990 Indian Malayalam film, directed by KS Sivachandran, starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Rekha in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar * Rekha * Vijayan * Rohit John Cherian ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Shankaran Kuttikku Pennu Venam
